data.message: Critical analysis of Decision Closure System spec: Challenged initial spec. Found existing duro_validate_decision tool. Proposed Option B: enhance existing primitives instead of new artifact type. Key additions: duro_list_unreviewed_decisions (surfacing), append-only validation history, auto-context in review flow. User confirmed this is the right approach.
data.task: Critical analysis of Decision Closure System spec
